targets.query: SELECT 'Weather Impact' as context_type, 'Satellite communication affected by rain fade' as description, 'Monitor signal strength, use backup if critical' as recommendation, '3-4 hours' as expected_duration UNION ALL SELECT 'Operational Status' as context_type, 'En route to port, navigation systems active' as description, 'Normal increased load expected during approach' as recommendation, 'Until port arrival' as expected_duration UNION ALL SELECT 'Crew Activity' as context_type, 'No crew change scheduled' as description, 'System resources available for normal operations' as recommendation, 'Ongoing' as expected_duration UNION ALL SELECT 'Maintenance Window' as context_type, 'Satellite equipment maintenance due in 15 days' as description, 'Plan maintenance coordination with shore' as recommendation, '15 days' as expected_duration

options.content:
## ğŸ” Detailed Pipeline Status

### ğŸ“¡ **Stage 1: Data Collection**
| Source | Status | Rate | Issues |
|--------|--------|------|---------|
| ğŸ“Š System Metrics | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 850/min | None |
| ğŸ“¡ Satellite Data | ğŸŸ¡ Degraded | 425/min | Weather interference |
| ğŸŒ SNMP Network | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 120/min | None |
| ğŸ“ Application Logs | ğŸŸ¡ High Error Rate | 1,200/min | 12 errors/min |

### ğŸ”€ **Stage 2: Vector Processing**
| Component | Status | Throughput | Latency | Queue |
|-----------|--------|------------|---------|-------|
| UDP Syslog Receiver | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 847 msg/sec | 2ms | 0 |
| TCP Syslog Receiver | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 124 msg/sec | 3ms | 0 |
| Log Parser | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 971 parsed/sec | 15ms | 3 |
| ClickHouse Sink | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 965 stored/sec | 45ms | 8 |
| NATS Publisher | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 127 anomalies/sec | 5ms | 0 |

### ğŸ’¾ **Stage 3: Storage Systems**
| Storage | Status | Write Rate | Disk Usage | Performance |
|---------|--------|------------|------------|-------------|
| ClickHouse | ğŸŸ¢ Optimal | 2.1MB/sec | 28.5GB (14%) | 99.8% success |
| VictoriaMetrics | ğŸŸ¢ Optimal | 847KB/sec | 12.2GB (6%) | <1ms query |
| NATS JetStream | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 127 msg/sec | 245MB (0.1%) | 0.5ms delivery |

### ğŸ¤– **Stage 4: Intelligence Processing**
| Service | Status | Processing Rate | Queue Size | Accuracy |
|---------|--------|----------------|------------|----------|
| Anomaly Detection | ğŸŸ¡ Backlog | 115 events/min | 12 pending | 94.2% |
| Correlation Engine | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 42 correlations/min | 0 | 87.5% |
| Incident Creation | ğŸŸ¢ Active | 3 incidents/hour | 0 | 96.1% |
| Prediction Service | ğŸŸ¢ Learning | 1 model update/hour | 0 | 94.0% |

### ğŸ¯ **Stage 5: User Interfaces**
| Interface | Status | Active Users | Response Time | Alerts Sent |
|-----------|--------|--------------|---------------|-------------|
| User Dashboard | ğŸŸ¢ Available | 3 | 120ms | - |
| Technical Dashboard | ğŸŸ¢ Available | 2 | 95ms | - |
| Alert System | ğŸŸ¢ Active | - | 250ms | 8 today |
| API Endpoints | ğŸŸ¢ Available | 15 req/min | 45ms | - |

### âš¡ **Performance Summary**
- **End-to-End Latency**: 156ms (from data collection to dashboard)
- **System Availability**: 99.7% (excellent)
- **Data Accuracy**: 98.9% (outstanding)
- **Alert Precision**: 94.2% (very good)
- **False Positive Rate**: 5.8% (good)

### ğŸ”§ **Optimization Opportunities**
1. **Anomaly Detection**: Clear backlog by optimizing weather correlation rules
2. **Application Logs**: Investigate source of increased error rate
3. **Satellite Data**: Implement automatic quality adjustment for weather
4. **Storage**: Consider archiving data older than 90 days
